system.requirements: Reach 2,500xp Spent (or any multiple of 2,500). Optional, can choose to stick with current specialty and gain +5 to any one Characteristic character has an Aptitude in. Prerequisite: Ratling
system.descriptionText: The Small size of a Ratling makes it easier for them to keep themselves hidden, to keep their feet light and presence undetected. This aids both in navigating unknown terrain and in the confines of a camp, where illicit dealings are best made away from the eyes and ears of those more reverent.
system.effects:
Replace Current Specialty's Aptitudes and Equipment with that of the Trailblazer. Apt: Agility, Fellowship, Fieldcraft, Finesse, Offence, Strength, Weapon Skill
Add. Equipment: Good Long Las or Good Sniper Rifle+Telescopic Sight or Good Shotgun, Mono Knife . Gain Talents: Catfall+Disarm or Surefoot Pathfinder
Can Purchase Basic Orders: Convenient Distraction,  Blatant Theft, and Notorious Pilferer
